sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>servant</radical> uses a <radical>stool</radical> to break open <radical>shellfish</radical>. You know how much work shucking shellfish is so this method is really <kanji>clever</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You knew hiring this servant was a good idea. "Clever girl," you say, as your servant sits on some shellfish again.
readingMnemonic: "More <kanji>clever</kanji> than you!" your servant yells, tearing off his wig. "It is I, <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai. I saw you take this shellfish from my master's lands."
readingInfo: You thought you were being so clever, taking shellfish from someone else. It turns out, there is a cost for being shellfish.
